text: Chidzitiro chomukova wokupinda muruvazhe chaiva chewuru yebhuruu, nepepuru netsvuku uye nomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka, basa romuruki. Chakanga chakareba makubhiti makumi maviri38:18 mamita angaita 9, chakaita sechidzitiro chaparuvazhe, makubhiti mashanu38:18 mamita angaita 2.3  kukwirira kwacho,
